about.title: About Us
about.mission: OACI.ai is your intelligent copilot for aviation regulations. We transform the chaos of regulatory information into instant, accurate, and cited answers.
about.tech: Powered by Google Gemini 2.0 Flash and a Hybrid RAG system with over 7,700 indexed documents (ICAO, RAAC, AIP). Modern architecture with Next.js 16, Pinecone, and Clerk for maximum speed and security.

q1.question: Is the information official?
q1.answer: We use official documents (ICAO Annexes, RAAC, AIP) as our knowledge base. However, OACI.ai is a support tool and you should always verify with the official source for critical operational decisions.

q2.question: Does it work offline?
q2.answer: The current web version requires an internet connection. Our upcoming mobile app will include offline capabilities for downloaded documents.

q3.question: Which documents are included?
q3.answer: We currently index ICAO Annexes (1-19), Key Documents (4444, 8168), Argentina RAACs, and the full AIP.

q4.question: Do you offer plans for Flight Schools or Airlines?
q4.answer: Yes. Our Enterprise plan allows user management, custom manual upload (SOPs), and dedicated support. Contact us for a demo.
